overview: Can We Call? is a contemporary romance about two young-adults from opposite parts of the World who find in each other the only support they got against the struggles and uncertainties of adulthood. This is an independent short film about loneliness, immaturity, self-love, and digital-age relationship.
tagline: Can We Call? is a contemporary romance about two young-adults from opposite parts of the World who find in each other the only support they got against the struggles and uncertainties of adulthood.
title: can we call?
